data.title: Mike Herrera Guest Appearances
data.text:
Too Bad Eugene

At Any Rate - 2000

Tracks: whole album [Mike & Yuri back-up vocals]

(Album was also produced by Mike and recorded at The Clubhouse in Bremerton - released on the Rock City Recording Co. label)

The Ataris

So Long, Astoria - 3/4/2003

Track: Radio #2

Jordan Tyler

Various Artists - Joshua Fest 2005 - 2005

Track: On My Own

Various Artists (Pat Boone, Bono, & many more)

Various Artists - Thank You Billy Graham - 6/22/2005

Track: Thank You Billy Graham

(Mike & Tom appear in the "Making Of" video on the DVD release as well)

Route 215

Shock 'em Dead - 7/27/2005

Track: Fight Song

Heart Like War

The Battle Begins EP - 12/1/2009

Track: Today I Grew Up

(Album was also produced by Mike and recorded at Monkey Trench Studios in Bremerton)

The Get Go

When Good Friends Tell Bad Lies - 2010

Track: Overcome

The Martyrs

If We Fall Tonight - 2010

Track: Better Day

Water Tower Bucket Boys

Sole Kitchen - 2010

Track: Blackbird Pickin' At A Squirrel

(Album was recorded at Monkey Trench Studios in Bremerton)

Marine View Drive

Five Days Down EP - 1/10/2010

Track: Let's Go Out

The Climbing

Perspective - 2/9/2010

Track: Fight Games

The Assasinators

Weaving Spiders Come Not Here - 4/2/2010

Tracks: Econarchy & Weaving Spiders

(Album was recorded at Monkey Trench Studios in Bremerton)

Stephen Egerton

The Seven Degrees of Stephen Egerton - 5/11/2010

Track: Cut Me Down To Size

(Track was written by Mike Herrera)

Small Town Nation

Battle Cry Of The Lost Boys - 9/17/2010

Track: Carpe The Diem

Avenue You

The Gravity EP - 2011

Track: Lodge Show At 3

Don

Cero Pretensión, Puro Corazón - 1/1/2012

Track: U

Someone Else

To The Stage - 2/1/2012

Track: Not Much Time

The Assasinators

Ma-Ha-Bone - 10/11/2012

Tracks: Keep Em Guessin, Fleeting Heart Americans, Electro Magnetic Pulse, Take A Number, You May Be Drunk & Illusionati

(Album was recorded at Monkey Trench Studios in Bremerton)

Heart Like War

Party Propaganda Machine - 10/19/2012

Track: Los Angeles [guitar]

​(Album was also produced by Mike and recorded at Monkey Trench Studios in Bremerton)

Ethan Luck

Greetings From The Garage - 12/5/2013

(originally released as a single in early 2013)

Track: When The Angels Sing [Social Distortion cover]

Gold Skies Ahead

Bremerton EP - 7/15/2013

Track: All This Way

(Album was also produced by Mike and recorded at Monkey Trench Studios in Bremerton - album cover also pictures the studio)

Oswaldo Rosero

Believe [single] - 10/13/2013

Track: Believe

(Album was recorded at Monkey Trench Studios in Bremerton)

Sons Of Strangers

Bringing The Sun Up/Taking The Sun Down - 10/31/2013

Tracks: whole album [bass]; Fading Fast [guest vocals]

​(Album was also produced by Mike and recorded at Monkey Trench Studios in Bremerton)

Jose Garzon

The Heartbreak Symphony In Drop D - 12/8/2019

Tracks: whole album [bass & some backing vocals]

​(Album was also co-produced by Mike and recorded at Monkey Trench Studios in Bremerton)

Krafty

Heavy Heart EP - 2/17/2014

Track: I Know You By Heart

​(Album was also produced by Mike and recorded at Monkey Trench Studios in Bremerton)

Adara Rae & The Homewreckers

Here Comes The Music - 11/19/2015

Track: Okay To Be Okay

​(Album was also produced by Mike and recorded at Monkey Trench Studios in Bremerton)

The Black Roses

Brick Wall - 1/12/2016

Track: Frenemy

Lttrs

Worlds We Roam - 4/25/2016

Track: Legacy

(Album was recorded at Monkey Trench Studios in Bremerton)

Marcus Smaller

I, Marcus Smaller - 5/20/2016

Track: Yeah, You'll Get Far

Jesse Jay Allen

Wrecks In The Rearview - 10/19/2016

Track: Breaking Down A Brick Wall

Sparrow Sleeps

Sparrow And Friends Start A Band - 10/21/2016

Track: 10 (featuring Mike & Sailor Herrera)

Johnie All Stars

Cuentos para No Dormir - 12/9/2016

Track: Lo Que el Viento No Se Llevo

American Hi-FI

Christmas (Baby Please Come Home) [single] - 12/21/2016

Track: Christmas (Baby Please Come Home) [Darlene Love cover]

Reboot The Robot

Ex Intentions Diversa - 6/6/2017

Track: Kidder Kidder

Doc Fly

Jumping The Shark - 10/13/2017

(originally recorded/filmed in 2013)

Track: Holiday Road [Lindsey Buckingham cover]

The Farewell Broadcast

Signals - 10/31/2017

Track: Loved And Lost (Pop Punk Version)

Winning Streak

Whichever Path You Take - 7/8/2018

Track: Whichever Path You Take

Steven Bradley

Summer Bliss and Autumn Tears - 9/27/2019

Tracks: whole album [group vocals]

Screeching Weasel

Some Freaks Of Atavism - 3/25/2020

Track: Losing My Mind

Mikey and His Uke

Rise Above [video collaboration cover] - 7/29/2020

Track: Rise Above [Black Flag cover]

​

[Featuring: Tim McIlrath (Rise Against) - Vocals

Moby - Vocals

Lou Koller (Sick Of It All) - Vocals

Mike Herrera (MxPx) - Bass

Darrin Pfeiffer (Punk Rock Karaoke/Goldfinger - Drums

Valerie Knox - (Anti-Queens) - Guitar/Vocals

Mikey Hawdon (Fairmounts) - Uke/Guitar/Vocals

Michael Crusty (Crusty Media) - Vocals]
